content: discover the enchantment of the spring green trinity stitch washcloth crocheted with worsted weight cotton yarn for unrivaled softness and durability the trinity stitch is a beautiful pattern created with clustered single_crochet stitches and chains the simple picot edging adds to its charm the video tutorial and stitch chart ensures success with the stitch pattern guiding you through every loop and turn treat yourself or gift a loved one with this lovely facecloth this pattern uses american crochet terminology
